text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Silence Suzuka and I are at the<n>special summer training
camp. It's<n>held every year to help students<n>prepare for
the races ahead.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: There are only a few days left of<n>camp...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
This really is the perfect environment<n>for me to focus on my
training. I'll be<n>sad to bid it farewell.
choice_data_list: Let's enjoy these last days to their fullest.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Hehe, that sounds good.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Oh, by the way, Trainer. About the<n>triathlon event...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The event that Silence Suzuka is<n>referring to has become
something of<n>a tradition at summer camp.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The triathlon features swimming,<n>biking, and long-distance
foot races.<n>Participants need a good command<n>over their
stamina to win it.
choice_data_list:
Oh yeah, you haven't signed up for it, have
you?

Oh yeah, you haven't signed up for it, have
you?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
No... My specialty is with medium<n>distances after all, and I
don't think<n>I'd be able to keep up as a front<n>runner for
quite so long...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: But...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Um... Would it be okay if I tried<n>anyway?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
It might help me enjoy this last part<n>of camp to its fullest,
like you said.
choice_data_list: Sounds good to me. I'll be cheering you on!
Sounds good to me. I'll be cheering you on!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Okay, thank you! I'll be sure to give it<n>my best!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After signing up for the event, the big<n>day rolls around
quickly.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
There are quite a lot of participants. I<n>wonder if this is part of
the training<n>regimen for some...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I suppose it's much the same for me.<n>I only intend to go at
my own pace<n>from start to finish.
choice_data_list: Gonna try switching up your style?
Gonna try switching up your style?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: No, I'm a runaway through and<n>through.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Um... Can I ask you a favor?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Do you think... you could get me<n>another reward?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Um... Oh right, I heard that there was a<n>festival happening
tonight. Do you<n>think you could take me there?
choice_data_list: Sure. We'll hit up some food stalls.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Thank you. Off I go, then.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: So begins the first event of the<n>triathlon.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Caster
text_block_list.text:
First, we'll have our contestants<n>battlin' the big blue!
Seems like<n>smooth sailin' today, but swimmin'<n>against
these waves'll be tough!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Caster
text_block_list.text:
And it's Silence Suzuka with an early<n>lead. Land or sea, she
doesn't give up<n>the front spot!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Suzuka's so cool!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
But this is a triathlon, yeah? Shouldn't<n>she be saving her
stamina?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Despite the concerns of some,<n>Suzuka is easily able to pull
away<n>from the competition in both the<n>swimming and bike
races.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: All that remains is the long-distance<n>contest.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Caster
text_block_list.text: It all comes down to this! Silence<n>Suzuka still has the lead!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Caster
text_block_list.text:
But what's this? Signs of slowdown?<n>The pack is closing in
on her!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... huff...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As I wait near the finish, I can see<n>Suzuka come dashing
into view.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: I don't think she has much left in the<n>tank...

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
She should be able to hear us from<n>here, so let's bring her
across the<n>finish! Go for it, Suzukaaa!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The triathlon is simply part of ourtraining regimen, so maybe I shouldn'ttake it too seriously—but I can't help myself.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I'm not entirely sure if she can hear<n>my voice, but that's no
reason to<n>skimp on the cheers.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: This scenery... It's mine alone!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Caster
text_block_list.text: Whoa! Silence Suzuka picks up speed<n>once again!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Caster
text_block_list.text: She's pulling away from the pack!<n>Look at those legs go!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Caster
text_block_list.text:
Her lead unwavering, Suzuka crosses<n>the finish line! The
winner of this<n>year's summer camp triathlon is<n>Silence
Suzuka!

text_block_list.name: Fans
text_block_list.text: WOOOOOOOOOO!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
That shaved ice was delicious! It was<n>just the thing I
needed after all that<n>exercise today.
choice_data_list: Was it more delicious than the taste of victory?
Was it more delicious than the taste of victory?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I can't bring myself to give up the<n>view from the lead in any
race. But I<n>knew that wouldn't be easy in a<n>
triathlon—that's why I wasn't<n>planning to enter.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
But then I realized that just like at the<n>fan event before, all I
had to do was<n>clear my mind and stop overthinking<n>it.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
It's thanks to your guidance and<n>encouragement that I'm
now able to<n>do that.
choice_data_list: So it was a good bit of training after all.
So it was a good bit of training after all.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Very... And there's one more thing I<n>realized as well.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Silent scenery filled only with the<n>sounds of the wind and
my own<n>beating heart... A world with no one<n>but myself in
it was the most<n>important thing to me.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: But I think that has changed a little bit.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
A world with no one else in it... except<n>for you, waiting for
me.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Seeing you is all I need to muster up<n>the strength to win.
choice_data_list: I'll always be waiting for you at the finish line.
I'll always be waiting for you at the finish line.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Hehe, thank you so much.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
No matter the race, I'll always find my<n>way to the front...
back to you.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Summer camp has clearly helped<n>Silence Suzuka not only to
grow<n>athletically, but also to more deeply<n>experience her
emotions.
